attributes.additional_details: The new GCSEs are putting young children under too much pressure. They need more time at home to sleep, socialise and study.
attributes.background: All Schools across the United Kingdom should begin no earlier than 10am. Students are under more pressure than ever from the new GCSEs and they are having to study longer than ever before. They are tired, frustrated and broken. They have less time sleeping or being with family etc. Change This...
